title: Smart Data Models - ExcST3A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE ST3A static excitation system with added speed multiplier.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcST3A

efdmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum AVR output (Efdmax).  Typical Value = 6.9. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc). Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

kg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Kg).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit gain coefficient (Ki).  Typical Value = 4.83. Default: 0.0

kj.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR gain (Kj).  Typical Value = 200. Default: 0.0

km.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Forward gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Km).  Typical Value = 7.04. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential source gain (Kp) (>0).  Typical Value = 4.37. Default: 0.0

ks.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ks1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 6.67. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

thetap.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit phase angle (thetap).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

tm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Forward time constant of inner loop field regulator (Tm).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

vbmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum excitation voltage (Vbmax).  Typical Value = 8.63. Default: 0.0

vgmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum inner loop feedback voltage (Vgmax).  Typical Value = 6.53. Default: 0.0

vimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator input limit (Vimax).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

vimin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator input limit (Vimin).  Typical Value = -0.2. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

xl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactance associated with potential source (Xl).  Typical Value = 0.09. Default: 0.0
